POSSIBILITIES:

	[ ] YOU CAN TURN YOUR SCREEN READER OFF,
		AND VOICE SYNTHESIS IS PLAYED UPON
		FOCUS OF CERTAIN the_elementS.
		
	[ ] THE SHIFT KEY & A ALPHANUMERIC KEY = PROBABLY NOT A OS COMBINATION.
		
	
			
	decor:
		EVERY:
			POSSIBILITIES:
				[ ] PRESS "i" GET INFORMATION ABOUT THE decor.
				[ ] PRESS "a" GET ACADEMIC INFORMATION ABOUT THE decor STACK.
		
			REGION STACK:
				
			
			
		REGIONS:
			WHILE NOT FOCUSED IN A TEXT INPUT
		
			KINDS:
				NAV, MAIN
		
			NEXT:
				R
			
			PREV:
				SHIFT & R
			
			
		TABLES:
			
			
		LISTS:
			UL & OL:
				NEXT:
				
				PREV:
	
	
		INPUTS:
			[ESCAPE] TO FOCUS ON A TEMPORARY TABINDEX BEFORE THE TEXT INPUT.
		
			TEXT:
			
			
		
		TEXT:
			HOW TO READ TEXT?
			
			
			
				https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SpeechSynthesis
			
				https://github.com/do-community/web-speech-demo/blob/master/public/main.js
			
				https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Web_Speech_API
			
				https://rapidapi.com/collection/best-text-to-speech-apis
				
				https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech
		
	PERTINENT:
		https://webaim.org/techniques/keyboard/accesskey
